subject: Saturday
body:
Can't afford to come 
into
Coastal Vacations?  

 
Now you 
can!
 
The professional Coastal 
Sales Center has 
created a special entry-level 
membership,
where you can get 
started for only 
$795. 
This includes a fabulous package 
of free
vacations and 
the full services of 
the Sales 
Center. (They 
have closed 22 sales for me
so far, 
and 
earned me 
over $40,000.)
 
Please watch the Coastal 
movie, fill out the 
form, 
then watch 
the second movie about
how the Sales Center 
will work for you.  Then
fill out the form again to 
enter the site.  Click
on Vacation Products, and 
read all about what
you'll get in the Entry 
Level Membership package. 
It even 
includes 
FREE AIRFARE to your dream 
vacation!   
 
http://www.RetireIn2008.com
 
You not only get that amazing 
vacation package,
you also get a great 
business.  The professional
salespeople at the Coastal Sales 
Center will close 

all your sales for you, and send 
you a check.  I
will teach you exactly how and 
where to advertise
your site, and I will also do 
a 2 MILLION email blast
for you to kickstart your 
business.  (You're reading
one of my emails now, so you know 
they work.)
 
Please check out this great 
opportunity.  Coastal
Vacations is the most-respected 
vacation supplier
on the web, and they have been in 
business for 27 
years.  Be among the first to 
take advantage of this
special Entry Level Package to 
start a business you
will just 
love!
 
http://www.RetireIn2008.com
 
After you check it out, please 
call the Sales Center
at 1-800-378-1169, they will 
answer all your questions.
Please tell them that I referred 
you, my ID is 4733MW.
I promise I will do everything I 
can to help you make a
big success of your new 
business.
 
Looking forward to working with 
you!
 
Michelle 
West
 
 
 
 
 
 
.










	  Blast4SuccessP.O. Box 38012 - Toronto, Ontario M5N 3A8 Canada
